mapper.insert: insert into T_SYS_USER(id, username, password, nickname, mobile, enabled, alipayNo) values(#{id}, #{username}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{mobile}, #{enabled}, #{alipayNo})
mapper.update: update T_SYS_USER set password = #{password}, nickname = #{nickname}, mobile = #{mobile}, enabled = #{enabled}, alipayNo = #{alipayNo} where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select * from T_SYS_USER where 1=1
and ( username like #{_search} or nickname like #{_search} )
and enabled = #{enabled}
order by username asc
